oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Buchanan's book of arithmetic
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Buchanan, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A small manuscript school book written, illustrated and bound by John Buchanan, early Nashville pioneer. The title page includes the date of June 20, 1781 but it includes pages with handwritten notes and later dates. The title page includes an embossed stamp and handwritten box label for the Tennessee Historical Society. Much of the content consists of arithmetic exercises.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Books; Mathematics -- Study and teaching
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives. Please properly reference collection and item
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
